snippet.title: the ups and downs of game development: MetroRunner Devlog #3
snippet.description:
this video is a devlog for the game i am working on, MetroRunner
this devlog represent a short synopsis of both how ive been and what i have worked on even a few explanations for the more clever features i have implented
game development can be hard but i sure know i can make it harder ;-;

#gamedev #gamedevelopment #indiedev #indiegamedev #devlog
